Teminat_IMM_Bedeni_Maddi_Ayrimsiz_Bedeli.pattern: İHTİYARİ MALİ SORUMLULUK[\s\S]*?Bedeni ve Maddi Zarar\.[\s\S]*?([0-9,\.]+)

patterns: MANEVI TAZMINAT KLOZU\s*:[\s•]*(?:MANEVI TAZMINAT KLOZU\s*:)?[\s•]*(İhtiyari Mali Sorumluluk Sigortası[\s\S]*?milyon TL[\s\S]*?dahil edilmiştir\.)
MANEVI TAZMINAT KLOZU\s*:[\s•]*(?:MANEVI TAZMINAT KLOZU\s*:)?[\s•]*(İhtiyari Mali Sorumluluk Sigortası[\s\S]*?dahil edilmiştir\.)
MANEVI TAZMINAT KLOZU\s*:[\s•]*(?:MANEVI TAZMINAT KLOZU\s*:)?[\s•]*(İhtiyari Mali Sorumluluk Sigortası[\s\S]*?teminat kapsamına dahil[^\n]*)
Teminat_IMM_Manevi_Tazminat_Bedeli.description: Complete manevi tazminat clause with fallback patterns - primary pattern captures clauses with explicit amounts, fallback patterns capture clauses without specific amounts or with different endings

patterns: (AXA Sigorta Anlaşmalı Yetkili Servislere.*?ekspertiz süresi dikkate alınacaktır\.)
Teminat_Ikame_Arac.description: Replacement vehicle service terms. Discovered AXA provides detailed service descriptions with dual track system: authorized/independent garages (7 days max) vs guaranteed services (30 days max with expert assessment). Multi-pattern approach captures full business terms (pattern 1) or exclusion statements (patterns 2-3). Improved from 35.7% to 100% success by adding fallback patterns for exclusion cases.

Teminat_Servis_Secimi.pattern: Servis Muafiyet Uygulamaları\s*:\s*(Bu poliçede kasko teminatı[\s\S]*?yapılacaktır\.)
Teminat_Servis_Secimi.description: Service selection and deduction terms - captures complete clause describing AXA service network (ASU, AGS, ATU) and deduction policies for non-contracted services
